data.title: How much is statistics used in finance?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 8): Statistics makes an appearance in many areas of finance - it's almost ubiquitous.

I spent a good part of my career working in credit modelling.  This requires a knowledge of a number of statistical concepts including (but not limited to) logistic regression, weights of evidence,...
